item.title: Essential Truths—Our Need to Act
item.description:
Essential Truths—Our Need to Act by Elder Adilson de Paula Parrella, Of the Seventy given in Session 6 of 187th Semiannual General Conference on Sat Sep 30 2017
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Adilson de Paula Parrella, Of the Seventy

item.title: Bearing Witness of Jesus Christ in Word and Actions
item.description:
Bearing Witness of Jesus Christ in Word and Actions by Elder Adilson de Paula Parrella, Of the Seventy given in Sunday Morning of 193rd Semiannual General Conference on Sat Sep 30 2023
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
